description: This file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints such as a welcome message, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller managing basic endpoints for greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when hitting the root endpoint (/).

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns an application health status string "OK".

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic information about the application.
